11903014f359de55.voiceContent: Oh, it's you. Have you encountered some troubles with your studies? Don't be afraid to tell Madam Faruzan. I'll give you all the help you need

13a591ce154d2f94.voiceContent: Day after day, I shut myself in and toiled away at my research... Even when I was out traveling in foreign lands, I made sure to keep my letters to friends and family short and to the point. I never shared any bad news, only the good

17ef1f8925c97d79.voiceContent: But the point of this trip would be to just help them learn to read some of the most commonly used words

1c24c726d1967119.voiceContent: Here, give me your hand. You've earned some candies. As for any questions you may have for me, or anything you want to bring to my attention... hold them for later

1c7f039ad32e9633.voiceContent: If some of the seeds that we plant today can take root and grow into lofty trees in the future, that is enough for me

22fcb04217c32b4b.voiceContent: Haha, one does not run into youngsters as kind and considerate as yourself nowadays

2345498acd552e67.voiceContent: Good, good. It seems like I'll be able to research my interests here to my heart's content after all

24cc301a7fdbdca7.voiceContent: Alas. I regret to say in the past, I have never had the time to consider the value of conversation

360f3c097001ee8d.voiceContent: Speaking of chatting... I once contemplated this concept in quite some depth

37814a00d3102b58.voiceContent: Hmm... Could you get me some pens and paper

3a98531e29c435fe.voiceContent: My body and mind are still in prime condition! Retirement? Maybe in another hundred years

3d642647de42166a.voiceContent: Ah, and suddenly the whole day seems a bit brighter..

3f3aec33744a0a13.voiceContent: Hmph, look at you, trying to figure me out. Do I detect someone is getting a little too big for their boots

454a7fa56845b9e9.voiceContent: Oh well, to the ends of the ruins with that. When they find me out, I'll just say my memory failed me. It's not like they can do anything to me

4c6075efc6472c76.voiceContent: Just what kind of mechanism allows all of this to be ensconced in a single teapot... I need to do some research..

54877f67a73c7b85.voiceContent: Do you have some time to help me out

557a5379518f0eff.voiceContent: She was wondering if I had any interest in paying her a visit, and perhaps holding a few literacy classes for the students..

712481f4d35c010c.voiceContent: It's important to appreciate what you have in the here and now... to value and cherish the people you are close to

7575a791d542ea5e.voiceContent: Even if it ends up taking me another hundred years... Hehe, I will be quite content here

75b46e0680c1282e.voiceContent: As someone I greatly value, you may occasionally find yourself in receipt of a letter from me, or indeed I may approach directly for a face-to-face conversation

76fd8e2187cb4b9e.voiceContent: Or to put it another way, every topic matters. For those who care about you, even the most trivial things about your life will be worth their full attention

7826c233324c1140.voiceContent: We want to learn more about the other person's feelings, opinions, and preferences. Plus, conversing also allows us to share interesting experiences, as well as ease each other's burdens

7987225acce8c2d4.voiceContent: Let's say, hypothetically, I were to discover some design flaws after staying here for some time... you wouldn't mind if I shared them with you, would you

86047de3c69463da.voiceContent: Whew... But there's no need to fret. You know me, I'm not one to dwell endlessly on the past..

93aa7514add72387.voiceContent: Hmm... Sounds like a perfect retirement plan... Hmph, forget it then

9631c59169295ff8.voiceContent: We want to make reading easier for them so they can hopefully discover more interests on their own

9791d1a313d9232a.voiceContent: Whether they choose to pursue the same field of research as me is a separate matter... Ultimately, it will all depend on their natural aptitude

9a676d2f14f65398.voiceContent: Just let me peruse these treasures for a little while..

9b45359e8dd0ebe7.voiceContent: Oh? Can't keep your eyes open anymore

a20b57e64774d1df.voiceContent: When I arrived in this realm for the first time, I was very surprised indeed by the unique configuration

a3de3c0d73e3fbd1.voiceContent: ...I just hope you won't find me to be excessively chatty

a5fe337374e0ce5b.voiceContent: It just came back to me. A little while ago, the Akademiya announced a new set of rules for off-site teaching. Every instructor must fill out a whole set of application forms

a7aaf180597d3716.voiceContent: Haha, so you haven't forgotten about my wish

aa8d1f8522444275.voiceContent: There's no point in teaching you a different kind of lesson right this moment, though. I still need time to finish some prep..

abe0991e054a2bb6.voiceContent: Oh! So many books... including some antiques that I've never laid eyes on before! Wow, just skimming through a few pages, I'm already captivated..

aff91e00062c308a.voiceContent: So here's a question for you What sets conversation apart from other means of information exchange — such as a debate, or passing on a message

b1d737705686f84a.voiceContent: Maybe I do nitpick every once in a while... but only with disrespectful students. Or those nonsensical rules at the Akademiya

c1ab4bc70d8d2c65.voiceContent: I dare say that I earned the title of a scholar. Yet I cannot call myself a good daughter, student, or friend

c90a3b829ec1f4bc.voiceContent: I'm quite comfortable. Don't worry, I'm not one of those crabby old geezers who love to find fault with everything... I'm usually quite easy to please..

d1389c29b65e8541.voiceContent: The exact topic of the conversation doesn't matter as long as you're learning about the other person

d317b59a06baff01.voiceContent: You're very agreeable, and the scenery here is quite lovely, so why wouldn't I like it here

d4e6be4e0012bd7c.voiceContent: Hmph, look at you, trying to take a dig at me. Do I detect someone is getting a little too big for their boots

d506519c9bf97386.voiceContent: Planning for my visit to the desert is far more important. Why don't you come with me to pick out some gifts? Snacks and toys... Let's get a good selection of both

dfca520dfd263772.voiceContent: Of course, if you are in need of some life advice, feel free to consult with me as well

e0089bebf4f875dd.voiceContent: I say all this only as a reminder to myself

ea6b072d632a8120.voiceContent: Do you think I could open a stall here? I can offer a few different services... translating ancient texts, deciphering puzzles, selling miniature mechanism models..

f205c7b743244880.voiceContent: That means you've worked hard today. Anything you didn't complete can be finished up tomorrow. Get some good rest

f5d603d7112194e5.voiceContent: But it wouldn't be polite to leave you with piles of notes everywhere..

f771cffe3d615337.voiceContent: Alright, there's no need to flatter me. If you agree with my sentiments, why don't you help me put them into practice

fa15615f7879e562.voiceContent: Hmm... I'm trying to figure out what the kids from the desert might enjoy. Would they prefer snacks or toys...

fb3f457122fbd534.voiceContent: Mm-hmm. A colleague of mine left the Akademiya some time ago to return to the desert as a teacher. I received a missive from her the other day

0c493d1a75b1e12f.voiceContent: If this was the actual Carriage, the Dendro Archon would have been thrown off by now..

0efe83dd5c9b8152.voiceContent: This design overturns centuries of Sumeru architectural tradition! The Dendro Archon would be devastated if she saw it

1027a7ef071c2b24.voiceContent: You call this a design! What possessed you to use that kind of material for the roof!

1fec1851b01cfd50.voiceContent: Don't mind us, Archon. Kaveh is an intelligent young man. He just goes overboard sometimes. Really lets his imagination run wild... Don't worry. It's a simple fix

2297665678b4fba7.voiceContent: Don't worry, Kaveh. I'll support you no matter what design you come up with

33da724568db0d8d.voiceContent: I don't make a habit of speaking like that to a capable junior

3976d662062f77a8.voiceContent: Kaveh, you truly are a genius architect

3d31383b3207ff9d.voiceContent: Well, at least you young people work fast... Alright, now's no time to slack off. We need to focus, or we still might not make it in time

549a6c4d7a70ddf7.voiceContent: A discussion more important than the candy tower? Finding a suitable material for the candy — that was supposed to be the priority, or we might not make it in time for the Parade

74c8c45d80a46a9e.voiceContent: AHEM! Hop to it, Kaveh! We need those plans! Do I really need to watch you do the revisions for this to get done!

7f487e64f451b510.voiceContent: Nice of you to finally show up! All young and capable, and yet not one of you could get here before a senior such as myself

8bfb8a463caffcf7.voiceContent: Oh! Not bad. Looks like a successful simulation

8c35a81a4e2184e9.voiceContent: Here, let me know if it works

8d5ecc2bf8a22ee3.voiceContent: Oh, and Kaveh... You wanted a mechanism to simulate the Parade, right? I finished it

9288f0588a4258e9.voiceContent: Hah, I knew it! I knew you had it in you

9e8c2eccdeb5f685.voiceContent: (Will I finally be able to attract some students?

a1a972496cbd1ad1.voiceContent: I'm sure you can come up with a new design in a few days, right

c85c584e4a21c2fc.voiceContent: Sorry for yelling just now, Kaveh. Don't worry — I have nothing but absolute confidence in your design

ce4d1e44106b8bcc.voiceContent: Well, then let's get to it — don't make me order you around like little kids

cf770a55baed89ee.voiceContent: Well? Did you figure something out

d72d281088bd14e8.voiceContent: Alright, now it's time for the production phase. Go ahead and sketch out the design — we'll deal with the candy part

dfc61a3300bf119a.voiceContent: Hmph! No more difficult than Haravatat's standard curriculum a hundred years ago

0579d110ef706ae6.voiceContent: Academic research isn't some kind of fad. Topics don't just go in and out of fashion

063145c153775ded.voiceContent: What is it that you'd like to learn more about? Different forms of pressure-based puzzle mechanisms? The base layer design of Elemental Monuments? Huh, wait... Did you forget to call me Madam Faruzan just now when you asked your question

0a6ce7b495d4f8cd.voiceContent: As a scholar, I should have the courage to accept failure and shoulder all of its consequences. I never wanted anyone to pity me, whether it be back then or right now. Also, don't forget that I eventually managed to solve that final puzzle by my own power, and freed myself from that accursed place... Instead of pity, shouldn't people feel encouragement and inspiration from my story

0a922964c6335a6c.voiceContent: I'm starting to get hungry... How about we go get something from the Grand Bazaar? Anything goes as long as it's not overly innovative.

1230ec89a0781978.voiceContent: I've visited numerous ruins of all shapes and sizes and interpreted what scant texts and symbols I could find. Ruin Drakes are indeed mechanisms of the highest order. Hmm... perhaps mechanism isn't the best word for them. You could argue that they're antiquated living organisms that have managed to survive until the present day..

1c8271f8ae066cca.voiceContent: Been a while since I've limbered up

278c66deafa700b9.voiceContent: A hundred years ago, my greatest source of frustration was my inability to decipher the information engraved on ruin monuments. Now, nothing irritates me more than the struggle to get funding. Ugh, it's making my head hurt again..

2942cf60fe662147.voiceContent: I want my students to truly enjoy the study of ancient texts. If I can't find anyone like that, then I just won't take on any students! Ah, right, about finding someone to help me with my work... It's pretty reasonable for students to help their mentors when they have some free time, right? I mean, even I did that back in the day..

2bf379ae1d9267b9.voiceContent: There's a new dessert that they call Padisarah Pudding. Who decided to create it? Shouldn't puddings be made with rice? These culinary innovations are really getting out of hand. Thank you, but there's really no need to share it with me, even if you made it yourself

3145b9586df298f6.voiceContent: Hey, how did we circle back here again..

34ef246d99691bb0.voiceContent: Youngster, there's nothing quite like an enthusiastic greeting to start your morning! Try to remember now What are you supposed to say

3aaf4759668238ca.voiceContent: This ancient text is making my head spin... Let's call it a night here and get some rest. I'll be heading to bed as well, so good night

3c684f04b3e6ee94.voiceContent: Focus now — show me what you're really made of

47f439ccaab979de.voiceContent: If I didn't accidentally lose myself in that King Deshret ruin, I could have contributed even more to Sumeru... Thankfully, my manuscripts and treatises were still put to good use. Those freeloading Kshahrewar used them to establish the fundamentals of the study of mechanisms. Haha, I'm not called Madam Faruzan for nothing, you know

4813bd2a1209e91e.voiceContent: Hm? This indescribable taste... Are you trying to get me to figure out what this is

48c199b2899a0c73.voiceContent: Ha, aren't you an energetic youngster? So enthusiastic, even about collecting materials

499d2bc6f7e84b54.voiceContent: How cozy... A breezy, open environment really is the best

4c846dde581f1a80.voiceContent: Interested in my story? Well, Madam Faruzan's life started more than a hundred years ago, and her story covers as much ground as some major academic publications. Still curious? Good, willingness to learn is an indispensable trait for scholars. You've got one foot in the door

4ebf51f9ba8e8272.voiceContent: The appearance, smell, and taste of this dish are all excellent. Do you read a lot of professional cooking books

50ff96709b9a6911.voiceContent: Hmph. My illustrious resume aside, my intellectual capabilities have been acknowledged even by the Anemo Archon himself. As for why I still can't find any students... Well, it's not due to any faults on my part or that of my Darshan. Maybe it's a matter of timing? I also received my Vision at precisely an opportune moment, after all

516a49d7e226178c.voiceContent: Sometimes, she'll lower her head and keep her distance when she sees me. However, she's all smiles and greetings at night... I don't quite get her. Anyway, most kids in Rtawahist are geniuses. A quirk or two isn't anything to concern myself with

551a80d7e278761a.voiceContent: When I was trapped, I spent so long solving puzzles that I became numb to even the flow of time. Now that I'm free again, I no longer have to face the puzzles of the world all on my own. Maybe we'll be able to spend some fun times together copying inscriptions, deciphering runes, and solving puzzles... Every minute should be savored

5ce926d4d3143155.voiceContent: One of my favorite projects is researching rainforest ruins. Ah right, I should ask Tighnari to come with me next time. It's always fun to travel with the living copy of the Rainforest Survival Guide. I must say, even though I've been around for more than a hundred years, he's seen far more varieties of fungi than I've had the chance to taste..

62e0c0aeef92a65b.voiceContent: Happy birthday! Here's a small toy for you. It's an assembly of a number of miniature puzzle mechanisms — you can find a button and lever here, as well as a roller to the side. Just play with it however you want, and I'll take care of it if it breaks. Hmph, and don't think I'm treating you like a child. Everyone, regardless of age, could use a moment of happiness and relaxation

67ae213be00fda3a.voiceContent: Don't act so surprised — scholars of every generation pull all-nighters for their research. After all, the night offers a precious opportunity to contemplate ideas and topics in peace

6a87da737f1b528a.voiceContent: Hm? This indescribable taste... Are you trying to get me to figure out what this is

6c787ae9e45fafcc.voiceContent: Here you go. Thank you, Madam Faruzan.

6ced97ea6005cf4b.voiceContent: Oh? You mean the new arrival? Yes, didn't he show up at the perfect time! I still don't know which Darshan he belongs to, but I seem to run into him all the time these days out on the streets, in shops, at restaurants... It's like he's everywhere at once. The way he nods his head when he talks, it's like... oh, I don't know, like... a little puppy, yes. Eloquent young fellow, too. Seems like a good egg. Anyway, are you acquainted with him? You must encourage him to enroll in my classes. Tell him Madam Faruzan will take good care of him

7344f1fefcd0c0a4.voiceContent: Some greedy merchants and mercenaries try to hawk antiques of unknown origin in Port Ormos at exorbitant prices, but their goods are nothing more than secondhand trash. Hmph, I bust their scams whenever I catch sight of one. My skill in antiques appraisal is probably second only to the gods of the Seven

796039a3a786d465.voiceContent: How beautiful... How awe-inspiring... Achoo! *sniffle* Yes, and very cold-inducing as well..

798c72d03dd67e39.voiceContent: Whoa! W—What? There's nothing wrong with being afraid of thunder even at an older age

7df176d8d4b3359a.voiceContent: A historical artifact? Hmph... never mind

7fe84626520a8e64.voiceContent: *munch* This is tastier than the food at most historic establishments. Could it be that the culinary arts haven't stopped improving

87373308ac1095cf.voiceContent: Hm? What did you say? I'm old now, so every other phrase escapes my ears. Try calling me Madam Faruzan, and I'll see if I can pick that up

89aeebcaa161b65c.voiceContent: Oh? Have you unlocked some kind of mechanism? A continuous current of power is streaming in

8ad8d7dc4be3b47e.voiceContent: The past one hundred years have only afforded me the glimpse of a spindrift floating upon the endless sea of wisdom. As for the fields and puzzles that remain to be studied and explored... It'll be up to you and I to reveal their secrets

8ffbeaf57d645442.voiceContent: *sigh* When you've been around for as long as I have, it's hard to stay sharp all the time..

9564d8b12db605b2.voiceContent: Going forward, Kshahrewar will be the only Darshan dedicated to the study of mechanisms... Hmph, if you ask me, the Kshahrewar scholars have gotten way ahead of themselves. When I was cracking puzzles all over Sumeru, they were still playing with rudimentary building blocks

99497cd114dd7a40.voiceContent: Knowledge is naturally something that cannot be limited or restrained. It's like how Kshahrewar can utilize Haravatat's research findings. All scholars will be grateful to Lesser Lord Kusanali for releasing the Akademiya— no, the entire City of Wisdom from the shackles of selfish desires. All who thirst for knowledge are now afforded the opportunity to search for treasures in the vast sea of knowledge

9a4722a329c5dc78.voiceContent: *munch* This is tastier than the food at most historic establishments. Could it be that the culinary arts haven't stopped improving

9b88cdbd7438843c.voiceContent: My field of study is nowhere as esteemed as it used to be, and Haravatat has refused me funding more than once. Every now and then, Kshahrewar will try to invite me to teach under their banner, and the conditions they've offered me are truly out of this world. More students, a higher spending limit... I still turned them down, however. No matter what, someone has to keep studying niche topics, so we can expand the frontiers of humanity's knowledge

9c623cd173755382.voiceContent: I haven't been a child for many, many years, so I don't see any reason to be excited about the rain

9d142d11ee891dc6.voiceContent: Cyno's jokes are composed using modern words and language patterns, but I still struggle to decipher any hidden meaning from his grammar and prose... Huh? It's all just literal meanings and homophones? Really...? Then, those jokes don't have any substance at all..

9e09a3f06a78b6d3.voiceContent: Sure, I'll hang out with you youngsters

a299900217ddddcd.voiceContent: Need the help of an elder, huh

c71d46db2e3f6536.voiceContent: Kaveh's a good kid with great potential. I had a casual chat with him once about some principles of mechanism construction. Hmm, how should I put it... He's too much of an artsy romantic, but at least he has some original ideas, which is rare nowadays. I've heard that he's fallen on some hard times, so I'm planning to invite him out for a good meal once my funding gets approved. It'll happen soon, promise

c72ab6b823e9ac95.voiceContent: Those geezers at Haravatat love to decline my funding requests with the excuse that my research's become too niche and impractical. By that logic, since we're still the Darshan with the lowest enrollment numbers, we might as well close our doors altogether

c7ee6520c3aa7988.voiceContent: A hundred years have passed, yet there hasn't been any change to those dumb rules at the Akademiya..

ce539fee0f11bbfe.voiceContent: The appearance, smell, and taste of this dish are all excellent. Do you read a lot of professional cooking books

d7db00b7bf9b9d03.voiceContent: Serious question why don't you become my student? I'll tailor research topics to your needs and thoroughly explain everything you need to know. We can focus on practical ways to unlock modern-age puzzle mechanisms, and build on that with some work on the deciphering of associated texts. I've walked the walk, so I can promise you that everything you'd learn would be a great boon for your future adventures. There's no reason not to trust me

db5c94e105fc239d.voiceContent: A find that was worth the trip

e0468668a3bb1b6e.voiceContent: I remember her; she's a courteous girl. I've only been to the Grand Bazaar a few times, but she's already remembered my name and face, and she's even tried to get the others to stop arguing with me. She really gets it! All youngsters should be more like her

e943dcec01a4800b.voiceContent: Hmm, seems you've put some thought into your tactics

f3ac5e38b370ca2d.voiceContent: You can improve the aroma of batter several times over if you bake it in the oven. Next time we're in the kitchen, I'll make some for you so you can get a taste of the flavors from my time. Since it'll be my super secret ancient recipe, I bet you won't find anything like it in the whole Grand Bazaar

f3ffb9806dd0b159.voiceContent: Ah, Collei... She's respectful toward her elders, diligent, and has a hard-working attitude — truly the perfect student! Children like her deserve all the affection and praise. Tighnari really has no reason to be as strict as he has been. Hmph... I need to find a way to win her over... Ahem! What I meant to say was, as a senior scholar, I should find ways to improve the learning environment of younger students

f52d05c1c01b01ed.voiceContent: Huh, you're really putting a lot into this... Don't worry, it's my responsibility as your senior to guide and protect you. I won't let you go astray

f5c3dbc5a2cbbde7.voiceContent: Solving a truly ancient mechanical puzzle requires deciphering a deluge of ancient texts. I don't mean to boast, but they're probably on a completely different level from the ones you've solved on your adventures. Oh? Don't believe me? Then why don't you pick out some of the hardest ones you've done and show them to me? If I spend more than a half hour on any of them, it's your win

f7d74569f25b9c1e.voiceContent: Here's the Akademiya's Distinguished Scholar Award, this is the Sumeru Puzzlers' League Lifetime Achievement Award, and there's something from the Synopsium on Ruin Mechanisms... What do you think? Got any interest in becoming my student? Ahem, just as a note, I am from the Haravatat Darshan. You'll get lost if you try to find me in the halls of Kshahrewar
